document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Talmost Villa (labeled #9) on Sashtar Street.
document_data.name: Talmost Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Talmost Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Talmost]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the north section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] on the southeast side of the intersection of [[Sashtar Street]] and the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] at the border with the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The villa contained four separate buildings arranged around a central garden. The buildings stood two or three stories tall.
